con:method.name: get the casefile for a caseInstance

con:config.script: // set the property at the test suite level if needed in multiple testcases testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Requestor", "hank") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Approver", "gerald") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("PersonalAssistant", "suzy") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("RequestorName", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Requestor")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("RequestorPwd", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Requestor")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("RequestorEmail", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Requestor") + "@requestor.com") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("ApproverName", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Approver")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("ApproverPwd", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Approver")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("ApproverEmail", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Approver") + "@approvers.com") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("PersonalAssistantName", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("PersonalAssistant")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("PersonalAssistantPwd", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("PersonalAssistant")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("PersonalAssistantEmail", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("PersonalAssistant") + "@pa.com")
